text: Věra Tichánková (7 December 1920 - 9 January 2014) was a Czech actress. She was born in Zarnovická Hut, Nová Bana, Czechoslovakia (now Slovakia). Tichánková studied at the Institute of Chemical Technology in Prague. She began her acting career in 1940 which lasted over seventy years. Věra Tichánková died on 9 January 2014, aged 93, in Prague, Czech Republic. She was survived by her husband, actor and playwright Jan Skopeček. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech television actors
title: Věra Tichánková
